document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c8b4f0">Dying </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">need </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">but </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">little, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">Dear, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">Glass </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70e498">Water's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">all, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9084d4">Flower's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a4c4ff">unobtrusive </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8e0ff">Face </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9064a8">punctuate </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9064a8">Wall, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70e498">Fan, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">perhaps, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9084d4">Friend's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48ff56">Regret </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9064a8">Certainty </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">one </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">No </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c8b4f0">color </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9064a8">Rainbow </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9064a8">Perceive, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">when </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">you </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">are </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">gone </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: The dying need but little, dear
